extendedInfo.description: The best FREE transparent screen app - start the app and it instantly makes your screen transparent. Have you ever typed or read on your smartphone while walking at the same time? If you too like to walk and read or walk and text, Transparent Screen is just made for you.Transparent Screen enables you to see through the screen with a little camera trick without forcing you switching to another SMS app or Email app. It just makes you entire screen transparent, and you can use your phone as usual. Again - itâs not just SMS, you can also browse the Internet or check for the latest news while on the go. Transparent is carefully designed with polished UI, which suits your stylish Android phone. Be ready to impress your friends and family with Transparent Screen!Transparent Screen is FREE! Just give it a try. An ad-free Pro version with many advanced features is also available on Android Market.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Really nice app.best for phones with high resolution.imagine reading while walking,however I wish it was faster.still I give it a - 5
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: The ideas great... Would be great if it worked well in high resolution...

reviews.title: Sweet
reviews.comment: Umm battery killer, but super cool. It actually works. It\'s so easy to use. Sweet!

reviews.title: Great app !!!
reviews.comment: Nice app but if camera motion would rub smoothly then it would be an excellent app Nice to grab attention of nearby buddies.  ....

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This is a simple yet very useful app. A widget would be good.

reviews.title: LG Viper 4G LTE Sprint
reviews.comment: All talk.  It opens but it does NOT make the screen transparent at all, not even a little bit. If you have an LG Viper, don\'t bother with this app. Android 2.3.7 Developer site unavailable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Epic! Uh-May-ZING!!
reviews.comment: I had a feeling that this could be possible. Now I\'m utilizing the future!! 5 star worthy when you update the accepted light fix without using the flash ;-)  This is like some 007 $#!% right here!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: sweet
reviews.comment: it was my idea since 2years ago - had an HTC Hermes 200 with Windows Mobile 6.1 and wanted to make some use of its poor 1.3 mega pixel cam lol - posted in many developers forums (like xda and others) but good to c this project here. wish u good luck with other apps.thanx
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Solves my issue of texting & walking
reviews.comment: I use Google voice as my texting app of choice. This is a nice complement to GV. Also works with any other app very well. Works well with my Samsung Galaxy Tab 2.
reviews.author: Austin Pritchett

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Very nice! Makes people turn my phone around or tell me my camera is on. I look forward to more apps from you.
reviews.author: Robert P

reviews.title: galaxy y
reviews.comment: 99% cpu used..... very slow down mobile. more battery use..... uninstall
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple Practical?
reviews.comment: I\'ve yet to use the app on the street but it works well and could come in handy when needing to text, etc while walking.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like it. But just use it 50%. So you can see better pictures and the media. Great app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good App...
reviews.comment: This is really a good app and it works nice... Good to see such innovative apps... Good job by developer.. :)...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: Nice idea, but the only display change on my phone is the running icon in the notification bar. I tried all the settings. Must require a top of the line phone. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Stephen Willis

reviews.title: Simply Good ..
reviews.comment: Very good concept & such a simple application interface. I like it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wicked for people watching too
reviews.comment: Awesome! I love it.im always walking & using my phone, this is great to avoid things & for discreetly checking people out!

reviews.title: Google user
reviews.comment: U have to keep turning it on everytime u turn the phone or the tablet on, other then that it\'s cool

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I love this app...no more worry about tripping over my kids toys while walking and trying to do stuff on my phone!!!

reviews.comment: Pretty good. Will re-rate after I have a chance to use it more.
